source.325f9064:
# Short introduction to each columns in data

1. show_id : This is a unique id assigned to every movies & tv
2. type: Video identifier. Is it a movie or TV show?
3. title: Title of the Movie & TV show
4. director:Name of Director
5. cast: Actors involved in movies and shows
6. country: Name of the country where the movie/show was produced
7. date_added: Date when movie/show was added on Netflix
8. release_year: Date when movie/show was actually released
9. rating: TV rating of Movie/show
10. duration: Total Duration(in minutes) or number of seasons 
11. listed_in: Listed genres for each Movie/Show
12. description: A short description for each movie/Show
